dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.bcoll.dunning.DunningNotification
dataStructure.description:
A DunningNotification is a communication or joint activity from the Telecommunication Operator to the customer to ask for a CustomerPayment or negotiate a PaymentPlan. The relation resulting from a DunningCaseRule might be - either only from the telecommunication operator to the customer (Ex: send a SMS) - or in both ways (Ex: a CSR call the customer to negotiate a PaymentPlan).

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: DunningNotification

child.name: date
child.description:
The date represents the date at which the notification is done.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: date

child.name: dunningCaseRule
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association DunningCaseRuleTriggersDunningNotification

This association end is optional
child.label: dunningCaseRule
